LanguageData.TKKN_PlantCactusBarrel.label: barrel cactus
LanguageData.TKKN_PlantCactusBarrel.description: Cactus that grows towards the sun, causing it to lean and eventually fall over.
LanguageData.TKKN_PlantCactusPricklyPear.label: prickly pear cactus
LanguageData.TKKN_PlantCactusSanPedro.label: san pedro cactus
LanguageData.TKKN_PlantCactusSanPedro.description: Fast growing cactus that grows in columns
LanguageData.TKKN_PlantDesertShrubA.label: desert shrub
LanguageData.TKKN_PlantDesertShrubA.description: Hardy, low lying plant that grows in arid conditions.
LanguageData.TKKN_PlantDesertShrubB.label: desert shrub
LanguageData.TKKN_PlantDesertShrubB.description: Hardy, low lying plant that grows in arid conditions.
LanguageData.TKKN_PlantSucculants.label: succulant
LanguageData.TKKN_PlantSucculants.description: A decorative plant with leaves or petals that are thick and fleshy, to retain water in arid climates.
LanguageData.TKKN_PlantWildCorn.label: wild corn plant
LanguageData.TKKN_PlantWildCorn.description: Wild corn is smaller and hardier than its domestic counterpart. Grows in a variety of soil, but produces small crops.
LanguageData.TKKN_TreeOcotillo.label: ocotillo
LanguageData.TKKN_TreeOcotillo.description: Unusual woody shrub that grows in arid conditions. Can be cut down for a little wood.
